actions.text: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 229 (Roll no. 49).

description: Amendment sought to change the overall deadline for holding expedited special elections from 49 days to 60 days.
purpose: An amendment made in order by H. Res. 125 and in lieu of the amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 109-10. The amendment inserts text providing that expedited special elections shall take place not later than 60 days after the Speaker of the House of Representatives announces that such vacancies exist.
